ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Over the past week, how much has the COVID-19 (coronavirus) pandemic negatively impacted your day-to-day life?
Have you or anyone you personally know tested positive for COVID-19? (Check all that apply) No
Have you or anyone you personally know tested positive for COVID-19? (Check all that apply) Yes I have tested positive for COVID-19
Have you or anyone you personally know tested positive for COVID-19? (Check all that apply) Yes someone I personally know has tested positive for COVID-19
How many people that you personally know have tested positive for COVID-19?
Have you received the COVID-19 vaccine?
Notes: 0=No; 1=I received 1 dose; 2=I received 2 or more doses; 3=Don't know/Prefer not to answer

ElementDescription: If you did receive a COVID-19 vaccine, which vaccine did you receive?
Notes: 1 = Pfizer; 2 = Moderna; 3 = Johnson & Johnson; 4 = I don't know; 5 = I prefer to not answer; 6=Other

ElementDescription: If you did receive a COVID-19 vaccine, which vaccine did you receive? If you selected Other, please type the name of the type of vaccine you received.
Date when first vaccine was received:
When did you receive your last dose of the COVID-19 vaccine?
Are you reluctant or hesitant to get the COVID-19 vaccine?
Why do you feel hesitant about getting the COVID-19 vaccine?
I am concerned about serious adverse effects of the COVID-19 vaccine.
Do you believe that a COVID-19 vaccine can protect you from the virus?
How much is the COVID-19 pandemic currently negatively impacting your finances?
How much is the COVID-19 pandemic currently negatively impacting your social life?
How much is the COVID-19 pandemic currently negatively impacting your mental health?
How often have you experienced negative financial changes, such as loss of income, due to COVID-19?
In the past 6 months, has anyone close to you (e.g., family, friends) gotten a COVID-19 vaccine?
How willing are you to receive another COVID-19 vaccine dose?
Notes: 1= Very willing; 2= Somewhat willing; 3= Not willing; 98= Do not know
